content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The first thing we suggest you do this week, which will help our team find a relevant position for you faster.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":75348,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d042dca6-b3a1-4222-9ba3-74ba50b012b0/4.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d042dca6-b3a1-4222-9ba3-74ba50b012b0/4.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"4.PNG\",\"name\":\"4.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"wildcardType\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d042dca6-b3a1-4222-9ba3-74ba50b012b0\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":811,\"height\":159},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UPSA Profile is the main source of information about your skills and experience. Your UPSA Profile is basically your resume that is sent to a customer and based on it the decision is made whether your knowledge and skills are appropriate for the project requirements. Now you see why it is so important, so check for more details and update your UPSA profile.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/EPAMAnywhereFellows/SitePages/How%20to%20upgrade%20your%20CV%20and%20update%20UPSA%20profile.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"GET DETAILS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
